content.raw:
The changes here look ok to me, my only 2 concerns are:

* A single config is shared among all `SimulationRunner`s, and consequently among all worlds - not sure if we want more flexibility than that.
* This is currently not using scoped names, so it will be hard to support plugins that are nested more deeply, such as visual plugins and sensor plugins.

I haven't looked into the other repositories.
